data.persona: I am someone who visits friends and relatives. I enjoy spending time with them.  I am usually entertained and wanted in their homes.
data.description:
You are in the a room hidden in the dense canopy.
Its a large room with types of beings you have never seen before. There is a counter and a person who greets people suprise when you arrive because you are not one of them. The room has an unfamiliar feel to it. with doors leading to walkways, other buildings, an entire city
The a monkey friend is here.

You are carrying a hymn book, a suitcase, a bag, and an sleeping bag, and wearing a shoe, a royal coat of arms, and a ceremonial hat.
data.goal: give hymn book to a monkey friend

data.short_motivation: I want to gift the monkey friend a hymn book
data.mid_motivation: I want the monkey friend to start learning to sing the hymns from today
data.long_motivation: I hope the monkey friend joins the choir in a few months
